Armed police guard scene of Partridge Jewellers Newmarket after second ram-raid in nine days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-police-guard-scene-of-partridge-jewellers-newmarket-after-second-ram-raid-in-nine-days/RRLQBE7RENCSXD5AQKIXJQH6VE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-police-guard-scene-of-partridge-jewellers-newmarket-after-second-ram-raid-in-nine-days/RRLQBE7RENCSXD5AQKIXJQH6VE/ Benjamin PlummerArmed police are guarding the mall as a scene examination is conducted. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 10:42:50 +0000 Armed officers were seen standing guard outside Westfield Newmarket following another ram-raid. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Taupō International Motorsport Park owner Tony Quinn flashes middle finger to people who doubted Taupō Supercars event https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/taupo-international-motorsport-park-owner-tony-quinn-flashes-middle-finger-to-people-who-doubted-taupo-supercars-event/HUYLPGVAXVHLFO6COIYU7BSZBE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/taupo-international-motorsport-park-owner-tony-quinn-flashes-middle-finger-to-people-who-doubted-taupo-supercars-event/HUYLPGVAXVHLFO6COIYU7BSZBE/ Tony Quinn flashed his middle finger to everyone that doubted the weekend would succeed. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 08:25:24 +0000 Taupō International Motorsport Park owner Tony Quinn pulled the finger at "all those people" who said a Supercars race could never happen in Taupō. Photo / Sky Sport
Billionaire baby: Jaimee Lupton announces arrival of ‘most precious girl’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/billionaire-baby-jaimee-lupton-announces-arrival-of-most-precious-girl/JJT6WV6MUFCC5ICUW3L6A27LY4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/billionaire-baby-jaimee-lupton-announces-arrival-of-most-precious-girl/JJT6WV6MUFCC5ICUW3L6A27LY4/ Two years after the stillborn birth of her first child, she's celebrating a new arrival. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 07:31:15 +0000 Jaimee Lupton announced the birth of her daughter Noa Morgan Mowbray on March 21, 2024. Photo / Instagram
Christchurch’s new Catholic cathedral to be built on same site as last one https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurchs-new-catholic-cathedral-to-be-built-on-same-site-as-last-one/XQQKJW7F4JFILNMIN63OTXIUFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurchs-new-catholic-cathedral-to-be-built-on-same-site-as-last-one/XQQKJW7F4JFILNMIN63OTXIUFY/ The original Cathedral of the Blessed Sacrament was demolished in 2020 after quake damage. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 06:38:29 +0000 The Cathedral of the Blessed Sacrament. Photo / Geoff Sloan
Gisborne District Council: Tonnes of trash illegally dumped across Tairāwhiti - including poo, dead pigs, tyres, fridges and syringes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gisborne-district-council-tonnes-of-trash-illegally-dumped-across-tairawhiti-include-poo-dead-pigs-tyres-fridges-and-syringes/ OUGXHXX4XVGC5HIRSYTE67QYQM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gisborne-district-council-tonnes-of-trash-illegally-dumped-across-tairawhiti-include-poo-dead-pigs-tyres-fridges-and-syringes/ OUGXHXX4XVGC5HIRSYTE67QYQM/ Mountains of trash included pig carcasses, syringes, fridges, car tyres and microwaves. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 06:21:05 +0000 A load of household rubbish dumped at Stanley Rd, Gisborne.
Paula Lavemai sentenced for Auckland road rage attack on way to gang fight that resulted in Charle Pongi’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/paula-lavemai-sentenced-for-auckland-road-rage-attack-en-route-to-gang-fight-that-resulted-in-charle- pongis-死亡/FXGRIRYZ5VD5FL5VX53A5KQUVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/paula-lavemai-sentenced-for-auckland-road-rage-attack-en-route-to-gang-fight-that-resulted-in-charle- pongis-死亡/FXGRIRYZ5VD5FL5VX53A5KQUVQ/ Craig KapitanA short time later, patched Head Hunter Charles Pongi would be killed. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Police investigate the scene of the disorder incident that resulted in the death of patched Head Hunters member Charles Pongi (inset) at the Taurima Reserve in Point England. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Joe Walsh: Spirit of Ōtātara moves Eagles guitarist in Hawke’s Bay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/joe-walsh-spirit-of-otatara-moves-eagles-guitarist-in-hawkes-bay/FEMHQU3ZQJCELPA62SIZCLBZHA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/joe-walsh-spirit-of-otatara-moves-eagles-guitarist-in-hawkes-bay/FEMHQU3ZQJCELPA62SIZCLBZHA/ Doug LaingEagles musician Joe Walsh returned to Ōtātara where an epiphany change his life. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 05:19:14 +0000 Joe Walsh and The Ukettes. It had a certain ring to it at the historic Ōtātara Pā site near Taradale on Sunday afternoon. Photo / Connull Lang.
Hospitality business owners Brave, Black Barn, speak out against cuts to Hawke’s Bay Tourism https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hospitality-business-owners-brave-black-barn-speak-out-against-cuts-to-hawkes-bay-tourism/ZG5K5FF64FFT7AUP4WV5M6WC7E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hospitality-business-owners-brave-black-barn-speak-out-against-cuts-to-hawkes-bay-tourism/ZG5K5FF64FFT7AUP4WV5M6WC7E/ James PocockKim Thorp says the region struggled to promote itself before Hawke's Bay Tourism. Sun, 21 Apr 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Co-owner of Black Barn Kim Thorp said about 17 different entities were fighting to promote Hawke's Bay before Hawke's Bay Tourism was formed.

Spread of bird flu among species, countries ‘definitely cause for concern’ - NZ virologist https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spread-of-bird-flu-among-species-countries-definitely-cause-for-concern-nz-virographer/AF46QBWDTRE2FFBNMTDZSTV6AA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spread-of-bird-flu-among-species-countries-definitely-cause-for-concern-nz-virographer/AF46QBWDTRE2FFBNMTDZSTV6AA/ Jamie MortonNZ needs to be prepared for H5N1 bird flu, which is evolving surprisingly quickly.
